segments.text: I see the woman standing in the puddle, and it’s kind of funny how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so clever, sneaking those cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so hard to reach that jar, and it’s almost like watching a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but it’s almost like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how oblivious everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and it’s like a scene from a cartoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is just so absurdly funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll ever notice the water or if they’ll just keep going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so calm, which makes this even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR
